tags: and no matter what keeping each other safe; it's what we do
summary:
Mighty Nein Re-Watch, Episode 23 "Have Bird, Will Travel"
Fjord: Can I confide in you for something?
Molly: Oh, yes...
body:
Mighty Nein Re-Watch, Episode 23 “Have Bird, Will Travel”

Fjord: Can I confide in you for something?

Molly: Oh, yes please.

Fjord: I’m a little unnerved about this sword. Would you stay and watch for a second?

Molly: This seems like a bad idea. Sure.

*they look at it for a bit and talk, during which Taliesin rolls a nat 20 arcana check on the sword and it’s symbology*

Molly: Something from the deep is in that. I don’t know. It reminds me of something.

Fjord: Yeah. Me too. I’m just not sure what. Please, I only confided in you because I feel like the stange is your ballpark.

Molly: I’ll keep an eye, and no matter what, keeping each other safe, it’s what we do. It’s what you do when you’ve got a group of people.

Fjord: Agreed.

Molly: We’ll keep you safe.

Fjord: I appreciate it, Molly.

…I’m not crying, you’re crying!

But also it makes me wonder how the story would have been different with Mollymauk. How he would have participated in and reacted to the trials they had at sea and what would be different. Don’t get me wrong, I love our Mr. Clay. But the what if’s will always nag.

blog.name: twinvax
blog.description: I write and reblog things for my fandoms. Main focus Critical Role. Feel free to send me asks or general headcanons about characters! I have a critical role rp blog! made and role played for Yeza the halfling (chemistyeza.tumblr.com). Asks open!

summary: Jester jokes that Nott could take off with how much her ears flap when she's happy
question: Jester jokes that Nott could take off with how much her ears flap when she's happy
answer:
After she has to do a lot of fun shenanigans with Nott to make her ears not be so sad because Nott kind of hates her ears and whenever their mentioned she does everything she can to keep them from moving because they aren’t hers.

Jester doesn’t joke about them anymore after learning about Nott’s past, but she does hug Nott a lot and watch her ears in case she needs some joy. Especially around Yeza, because her ears totally go crazy around him sometimes.

blog.name: hazelcephalopod
blog.title: Another Side of the Mirror
blog.description:
This has mostly turned into a CR blog-thing... I tag Thursday show until around Tuesday.

Hello peoples of Tumblr! This is my blog, which I make no promise to keep up with. I'm a bisexual Autistic. Also have ADD. I like cephalopods, especially cuttlefish, and plants, and reading, and many other geeky things.

More random tidbit: feminist, somewhere in the left politically, and tired of the political landscape but still trying to care. Also a lapsed pagan, it sounds like nonsense but idk how else to describe it. More things- gluten free, and crochet, knitting, and others. Beware of my many random posts as well.

That is all for now!

Oh BTW I am bad at tagging things, trying to get better, but its a work in progress.

summary: CR
body:
CR

Here are some Roc (giant bird) stats, based on official rules.

  1. It’s a monstrosity.
  2. It’s a CR 11, with around 200-300 HP and armor class of 15.
  3. It’s fly speed is 120’ (so a bit slower than Vax).
  4. It can make a make an attack with its beak [+13 to hit, 10’ range, 4d8+9 piercing damage], and on with its talons [+13 to hit, 5’ range, 4d8+9 slashing damage]. Additionally with its Talons it can grapple and restrain a creature, but while holding a creature the roc can’t make more talon attacks [escape DC 19]. All strength based [+9].
  5. It has average dexterity, wisdom, and charisma, and terrible intellegience at a whopping 3. But it has saving throws of of 4, 4, and 3 in the first three.

Grappled: the affected creatures speed is 0.

Restrained: also 0 speed, and attack rolls against the affected creature are at advantage and their attacks are at disadvantage. Also the creature has disadvantage on dexterity saving throws.

PS: the ’ means feet.

summary: Imagine Nott happy flapping to stim with her ears. Imagine Cad doing a similar thing
question: Imagine Nott happy flapping to stim with her ears. Imagine Cad doing a similar thing
answer: That’s adorable and I would love to see art of that. Though Nott’s happy flapping with her ears needs to have her shoulder wiggling thing she does as well whenever she’s pleased or happy about something.

summary: Hey critical role fandom! Would you like some nightmares? I really liked Matt’s description of these creepy bastards (and the...
caption:
Hey critical role fandom! Would you like some nightmares?

I really liked Matt’s description of these creepy bastards (and the jumpscare)
that I grabbed my notebook mid episode and sketched this guy out


(they make me think of necromorphs so now i hc that every spike of stone in the barbed fields is actually a marker and exandria is doomed to be eaten by their moons- anyways how is your day going?)

Pencil sketch below
